Simply put, OsteoStrong delivers unprecedented improvements for physical health and performance at the foundation: Bones, Muscles, and Balance.

First, it’s important to know that OsteoStrong is not a gym, diet, drug or supplement. In fact, we do not even compete with the gym industry. We offer a customer experience that is completely different!

What makes OsteoStrong different from just another exercise fad or fitness trend is that the results are measurable and easily achieved with about 7-minutes of sweat-free effort once per week…and you come dressed as you are…no gym clothes.

If you think this sounds too good to be true, then your reaction is completely normal. That’s because most of us have been trained to believe that physical development only comes from hours of strenuous effort in the gym every week.

Most of us have a hard time un-learning what we thought to be a well-established truism of the human body. However, the quick OsteoStrong results are undeniable and our system is based on scientific principles, which have been known for decades.

The science behind OsteoStrong starts with Wolff’s Law. It is a scientific principle which is still taught in medical schools to this day. It was identified in the early 1900’s by Dr. Julius Wolff and teaches that bones, when subjected to enough pressure, will respond by getting stronger. The US Surgeon General issued a report in 2004 on Bone Density and Osteoporosis that echoed the findings in Dr. Wolff’s research. The Surgeon General expanded Wolff’s explanation by stating that bones will get stronger when subjected to multiples of one’s own body weight.

The results are staggering. Our members are experiencing between 3 to 10% bone mineral density increases in just their first 12 months in sessions that only take about 7 minutes once a week.

In the 70s, Eastern Europeans made a key discovery in training muscle fibers that lead to Gold Medal wins for Romanian power-lifters in the Olympic games. The focus of their training method was to try to engage every fiber in a given muscle at the same time. Once almost all muscle fibers are triggered simultaneously, the brain activates an adaptive response to grow more muscle fiber. It’s that simple.

Muscular strength gains are measured after each session, and the member instantly receives their personal performance report. It is very common to see members doubling their measurable force production in under 12 months. This type of increase is unheard of with any other modality of training.

OsteoStrong sessions are quick and effective. Many members who have experienced years of joint and back pain frequently report a complete reversal of their symptoms after just 2 to 12 sessions. Many members also comment that their balance greatly improves after their first month. The benefits of OsteoStrong are that members see maximum results with minimal effort and time.

At OsteoStrong, our members see amazing results in increased bone and muscle strength, improved balance, and reduced joint and back pain in a safe and comfortable environment from just one 7 minute session per week.

Fitness is in. The percentage of people belonging to health clubs and gyms has doubled over the past 20 years. More growth is expected, fueled by an aging Baby Boomer generation in search of eternal youth and the reality that regular exercise can prevent or control diseases that are driving health care costs relentlessly upward. The 24/7 fitness opportunity is the newest model of fitness centers today. 
 
Economically, the health club industry has proven to be recession proof, averaging an 8% annual growth rate since the early 1990's. 
 
This 24/7 keycard access fitness center is for sale in a great location. The #1 reason people refrain from joining a gym is because they feel they don't have the time to fit in their workouts. Well, our members love the flexibility of being able to use the gym whenever their schedule permits. 
 
The #2 reason people don't join a gym is because they're typically too far from home and it's a hassle to get there. Well, this facility is surrounded by area subdivisions so being able to draw a full membership from within a 3-mile radius makes it convenient for members. 
 
Be surrounded by others who want to live a healthier lifestyle. With more and more insurance companies looking to reimburse wellness care, the fitness industry is primed for continued growth. 
 
The facility comes complete with all new state of the art Cybex strength training and cardio equipment. Perfect for the absentee owner, the health club is outfitted with surveillance cameras for monitoring and safety. Members love the mirrored walls, mounted televisions and stand up tanning bed. There's also a private office in the back for personal training consultations.
